body_html:
@honkentuber: Thanks for your response and sorry for my delay!

How exactly would I use init_from_checkpoint in the model_fn? And how would I test if this is the first run of my model (which is when I want to load the checkpoint from elsewhere) and when I continue training in the same folder (then I'd like to use the normal checkpoint loading). Can you outline a small example?

body:
@honkentuber: Thanks for your response and sorry for my delay!

How exactly would I use `init_from_checkpoint` in the `model_fn`? And how would I test if this is the first run of my model (which is when I want to load the checkpoint from elsewhere) and when I continue training in the same folder (then I'd like to use the normal checkpoint loading). Can you outline a small example?
